duties_responsibilities.duty: Organize project-related meetings, handle correspondence, and manage schedules.
Maintain and update research-related documents, databases, and records.
Facilitate communication between team members, collaborators, and stakeholders.
Coordinate procurement of supplies, assist in grant applications, and reports.
Coordinate virtual meeting logistics, compile materials, and ensure preparedness.
Assist in ensuring ethical compliance and documentation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in relevant field (Master's preferred)
